name: Remaining Amount Project Wise
query:
SELECT Project,  
SUM(Installment_amount) AS Installment_amount, 
SUM(paid_amount) AS paid_amount, 
SUM(((Installment_amount) - (paid_amount ))) AS balance_amount
FROM (
    SELECT
        c.name,
        c.project as Project,
        c.posting_date as DocDate,
        c.customer as Customer,
        c.plot_no,
        d.Installment,
        d.date as installment_date,
        d.idx,
        d.amount AS Installment_amount,
        IFNULL((
            SELECT SUM(b.paid_amount)
            FROM `tabCustomer Payment` AS a
            INNER JOIN `tabCustomer Payment Installment` AS b
            ON a.name = b.parent
            WHERE a.docstatus = 1
            AND a.document_number = c.name
            AND b.base_doc_idx = d.idx
            AND a.plot_no = c.plot_no
        ), 0) AS paid_amount
    FROM
        `tabPlot Booking` AS c
    INNER JOIN
        `tabInstallment Payment Plan` AS d
    ON
        c.name = d.parent
    WHERE
        c.status = 'Active' AND c.docstatus = 1
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
        c.name,
        c.project as Project,
        c.posting_date as DocDate,
        c.to_customer as Customer,
        c.plot_no,
        d.Installment,
        d.date as installment_date,
        d.idx,
        d.amount AS Installment_amount,
        IFNULL((
            SELECT SUM(b.paid_amount)
            FROM `tabCustomer Payment` AS a
            INNER JOIN `tabCustomer Payment Installment` AS b
            ON a.name = b.parent
            WHERE a.docstatus = 1
            AND a.document_number = c.name
            AND b.base_doc_idx = d.idx
            AND a.plot_no = c.plot_no
        ), 0) AS paid_amount
    FROM
        `tabProperty Transfer` AS c
    INNER JOIN
        `tabInstallment Payment Plan - Transfer` AS d
    ON
        c.name = d.parent
    WHERE
        c.status = 'Active' AND c.docstatus = 1
) x
WHERE 
	x.Project = %(project)s AND x.installment_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY 
    x.Project;
